ai-mil3.6.4:1.2_0: “Since you’re so celibate, with the Buddha?”
ai-mil3.6.4:1.4_0: “Well then, sir, the Buddha looked for a brahmin.”
ai-mil3.6.4:1.5_0: “But, great king, is there a bull elephant?”
ai-mil3.6.4:1.7_0: “Why, great king, when will that very best spear?”
ai-mil3.6.4:1.9_0: “Well, great king, have the sword and directly known something else?”
ai-mil3.6.4:1.11_0: “But, great king, is Brahmāyu who is awakened for themselves?”
ai-mil3.6.4:1.13_0: “Well then, great king, teach this Brahmā.”
